EmailTemplate.name: 48 notification to Buyer
EmailTemplate.subject: 48 Hour Notification Received: {!Case.Vehicle_Year_Make_Model__c}, VIN {!Case.Vehicle_VIN_Last_6__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Account},
We have received your 48 hour notice of intent to withdraw the offer for the below mentioned vehicle:
{!Case.Vehicle_Year__c} {!Case.Vehicle_Make__c} {!Case.Vehicle_Model__c}
{!Case.VIN__c}
Auction ID: {!Case.Auction_ID_s__c}
If the title is received within 48 hours, you will be notified via email.
If the title is not received within 48 hours, we will reach out to discuss next steps.
In the meantime, please reach out to your ACV Title Clerk, {!Case.OwnerFullName}, at {!Case.OwnerEmail} with any questions.
Thank you!
Titles Team
ACV Auctions
